volume-attachment
*****************


Description
===========

A base object for all types of attachments between a storage volume
and an instance. For specific details about iSCSI attachments, see
IScsiVolumeAttachment Reference.

For general information about volume attachments, see Overview of
Block Volume Storage.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* attach

* attach-iscsi-volume

* attach-paravirtualized-volume

* detach

* get

* list
